channel.title: Pizza on Table41NYC
channel.description: Recent content in Pizza on Table41NYC

item.title: Adrienne's Pizza Bar
item.description: Was ok. Nothing too memorable. Got the pizza with proscuitto on top. I think they should’ve cut it into smaller pieces.

item.title: Macchina
item.description: They are known on Instagram for their Burrata pizza which was about $25. It was ok. I wouldn’t go out of my way to get it because it literally is just a margarita style pizza with a big piece of burrata cheese in the middle. The burrata wasn’t that soft when cut for some reason.

item.title: Pizza Rollio
item.description: This place is just OK. Super gimmicky with the rolling pizza thing. Would rather have a slice than that. It’s like eating a super thin pizza that is malleable.

item.title: Marta
item.description: Pretty good. The meat one with all the salami was good.

item.title: Detroit Pizza
item.description: The full name of this restaurant is “Lions and Tigers and Squares Detroit Pizza”. Obviously did not want that in the title of the post. Got the pepperoni and yellow peppers, and it was pretty good. Not too expensive… ~$12-14

item.title: Martina Pizzeria
item.description: Fast food version of Marta’s. It’s good. I like the salami and hot peppers, and it’s fairly inexpensive.

item.title: Champion
item.description: There are actually a lot of locations for this. I think Vinnie’s way better in the north Williamsburg area.

item.title: Roberta's
item.description: Pizza is pretty good and cheap. Their beer list is pretty good.

item.title: Vinnie's
item.description: My cousin Vinnie’s place is the best. Love the cali burger.
